Articles.Content:
I wouldn't usually post an introduction about myself since I personally saw it as "cringe", but I think I should give it a try.

I'm a proud KSP RSS/RO/RP-1/Principia player, but sometimes I play stockalike as well. I'm also an amateur config modder, in which my first published mod can be found here: [snip] (Go and check it out if you're interested). I really hope I can have fun here. 

Edited August 1, 2022 by Gargamel
Snip pending licenses and proper thread
